coverLetter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the {{position}} role{{vessel}}.

With {{yearsExperience}} years of experience in the yachting industry, I have developed a strong foundation in {{skills}}. I am confident that my skills and experience make me a strong candidate for this position.

I am available {{availableFrom}} and would welcome the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to your team.

Thank you for considering my application.

Best regards,
{{name}}
